languages.text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Гопо{mf|дин|жа}, вы знаете, как жестоки бывают интриги. М-моя семья совсем недавно обрела высокий статус, и это многим не нравится..." {n}Мужчина запинается: от страха у него стучат зубы.{/n}

"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} knows how ruthless court intrigues can be. My f-family only recently attained its lofty status, and many here are opposed..." {n}he stutters, his teeth chattering in fear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Гопо{mf|дин|жа}, вы знаете, как жестоки бывают интриги. М-моя семья совсем недавно обрела высокий статус, и это многим не нравится..." {n}Мужчина запинается: от страха у него стучат зубы.{/n}

"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} knows how ruthless court intrigues can be. My f-family only recently attained its lofty status, and many here are opposed..." {n}he stutters, his teeth chattering in fear.{/n}

languages.text: “来自上界的大人啊，您肯定了解宫廷之中的权谋斗争有多么残酷。我的家族不久前刚刚得到了尊贵的地位，而这里有许多人反对我们……”{n}他结结巴巴，牙齿打颤，恐惧不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} knows how ruthless court intrigues can be. My f-family only recently attained its lofty status, and many here are opposed..." {n}he stutters, his teeth chattering in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人啊，您肯定了解宫廷之中的权谋斗争有多么残酷。我的家族不久前刚刚得到了尊贵的地位，而这里有许多人反对我们……”{n}他结结巴巴，牙齿打颤，恐惧不已。{/n}

languages.text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}は、宮廷の陰謀がいかに冷酷なものかをご存じのはずです。わ、我が家はようやく高い地位を得たばかりで…ここには多くの反対者が…」{n}彼は恐怖に震えながらどもり、歯をカチカチと鳴らした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} knows how ruthless court intrigues can be. My f-family only recently attained its lofty status, and many here are opposed..." {n}he stutters, his teeth chattering in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}は、宮廷の陰謀がいかに冷酷なものかをご存じのはずです。わ、我が家はようやく高い地位を得たばかりで…ここには多くの反対者が…」{n}彼は恐怖に震えながらどもり、歯をカチカチと鳴らした。{/n}

languages.text: «Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial sabe lo despiadadas que pueden ser las intrigas cortesanas. Hace poco tiempo que mi familia obtuvo su estatus, y hay mucha gente aquí que se opone a ello...». {n}Farfulla con los dientes castañeteando de puro miedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} knows how ruthless court intrigues can be. My f-family only recently attained its lofty status, and many here are opposed..." {n}he stutters, his teeth chattering in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial sabe lo despiadadas que pueden ser las intrigas cortesanas. Hace poco tiempo que mi familia obtuvo su estatus, y hay mucha gente aquí que se opone a ello...» {n}farfulla con los dientes castañeteando de puro miedo.{/n}

languages.text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, saray entrikalarının ne kadar acımasız olabileceğini bilir. B... Benim ailem, yüce statüsüne daha yeni ulaştı. Buradaki birçok kişi de buna karşı..." {n}Kekelemeye başlıyor, korkudan dişleri birbirine çarpıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} knows how ruthless court intrigues can be. My f-family only recently attained its lofty status, and many here are opposed..." {n}he stutters, his teeth chattering in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, saray entrikalarının ne kadar acımasız olabileceğini bilir. B... Benim ailem, yüce statüsüne daha yeni ulaştı. Buradaki birçok kişi de buna karşı..." {n}Kekelemeye başlıyor, korkudan dişleri birbirine çarpıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Céleste Seigneurie sait à quel point les intrigues de cour peuvent être impitoyables. Ma f-famille ne s'est que récemment hissée au-dessus de la roture, et beaucoup ici s'opposent à... » {n}dit-il en bégayant et en tremblant de peur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} knows how ruthless court intrigues can be. My f-family only recently attained its lofty status, and many here are opposed..." {n}he stutters, his teeth chattering in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Céleste Seigneurie sait à quel point les intrigues de cour peuvent être impitoyables. Ma f-famille ne s'est que récemment hissée au-dessus de la roture, et beaucoup ici s'opposent à... » {n}dit-il en bégayant et en tremblant de peur.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin}, Ihr wisst, wie gnadenlos höfische Intrigen sein können. Meine F-Familie hat ihren vornehmen Status erst kürzlich erhalten, und viele hier sind dagegen ..." {n}Er stottert und seine Zähne klappern vor Angst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} knows how ruthless court intrigues can be. My f-family only recently attained its lofty status, and many here are opposed..." {n}he stutters, his teeth chattering in fear.{/n}
